img_summary: The image depicts a tray containing Fire Date Seeds, a rare item in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. According to the surrounding text, these seeds are categorized as "Rare" and are obtained randomly when collecting Fire Dates. They are part of a broader collection of seeds with varying rarity and acquisition methods in the game.
